policy.name: Linux - CPU Threshold Exceeded
policy.description: The CPU on the SERVER instance has exceeded 95% for at least 15 minutes. The metric netuitive.linux.cpu.total.utilization.percent factors in cpu steal as part of its computation. Check cpu.total.steal for the instance. If the value is high, it could mean a neighboring virtual machine is hogging the physical cpu. For instances running in AWS, stopping and starting the EC2 should resolve the issue as the virtual machine is moved to a different hypervisor.
